description.ko: AURA-7에 대한 이 시각적 탐구는 자연적 성장과 유체 역학의 본질을 포착합니다. 이는 에너지와 생물학의 조화로운 융합을 나타내며, 빛이 살아 숨 쉬는 형태를 통해 물처럼 흐르는 모습을 보여줍니다.
description.en: This visual exploration of AURA-7 captures the essence of natural growth and fluid dynamics. It represents a harmonious fusion of energy and biology, where light flows like water through living, breathing forms.

prompt: A cinematic and ethereal 3D render of AURA-7 embodying Organic Flow. The visual features flowing bioluminescent liquid silk, translucent membranes, and soft undulating curves reminiscent of deep-sea organisms. Iridescent gradients of pearlescent white, soft teal, and violet blend seamlessly. Macro photography style, soft focus background, hyper-detailed textures, elegant natural movement, 8k resolution, serene atmosphere.
